name: 威士忌千層
description: The Pom Pom cushion 45x45 cm from the Swedish By On is a pure dream for those who love soft and cosy styles of decor. This wonderful cushion.

name: 玫瑰荔枝千層
description: The beautiful Rustic mug from House Doctor is made of ceramics and has an appealing glaze in grey and blue that contributes to a rustic.
description_long: The beautiful Rustic mug from House Doctor is made of ceramics and has an appealing glaze in grey and blue that contributes to a rustic feeling. Since it's handmade, every mug is unique. Match it with other tableware in the Rustic series.

name: 水蜜桃千層
description: Cas plays modern with rustic wood, framing the rich color and defined grain of natural oak veneer in dark grey high-gloss lacquer.
description_long: Cas plays modern with rustic wood, framing the rich color and defined grain of natural oak veneer in dark grey high-gloss lacquer. Tinted warm brown with hints of grey, planks of veneer arrange the nightstand's four drawers in seamless asymmetry.

name: 【父親節限定】金箔摩卡千層
description_partA: 蛋糕上的裝飾，深色擠花是巧克力奶餡，我使用法國法芙娜72%阿拉瓜尼鈕扣，和isigny鮮奶油一起充分混合後，再一起拌入打發的澳洲鮮奶油內，這樣製作起來的奶餡口感很挺，剛送入口中時，可可脂的香氣和奶香一路往上衝，衝到你的鼻腔，你會感覺自己好像聞到了剛烤出來的核桃味，還來不及反應的同時，巧克力奶餡在嘴中融化了，而且那口感一點都不會覺得甜，而是回甘，這趟旅程，如果你坐著的話，建議靠在椅背上，頭輕輕的仰望天花板，你一定會很享受！
description_partB: 再來是蛋糕上咖啡色的奶餡，是用手沖咖啡加上可可粉一起調和出的奶餡，這邊會比較強調咖啡的味道，讓咖啡、可可、巧克力、鮮奶油等等一起融合，創造出最豐富的層次感，這就是我心中的父親節蛋糕，這個金箔摩卡千層蛋糕，只為今年父親節而生，時間到後，永久下架，明年，我再做新的!
ingredients: 法國法芙娜72%阿拉瓜尼鈕扣、CACAO BARRY 可可粉、isigny鮮奶油、食用金箔、牛奶、糖、雞蛋、麵粉澳洲鮮奶油、核桃
alert: (此蛋糕有牛奶、核桃，不適合過敏體質者食用)

name: 荷蘭草莓乳酪千層
description: The High Dot stool leather from Fritz Hansen is a stable little seat made from premium leather and three legs of quality steel.
description_long: The High Dot stool leather from Fritz Hansen is a stable little seat made from premium leather and three legs of quality steel. The original Dot stool design was realized in 1954 by Arne Jacobsen and Fritz Hansen. This is an updated version of the classic, now with a sustainable twist: it utilizes the same high-quality leather as the design icons Ägget and Svanen for its luxurious and comfortable seat. Three braces on the bottom serve as convenient footrests while also providing additional stability. The High Dot stool is perfect for a high desk or kitchen island and makes for a striking interior detail in any design-conscious home.

name: 枋山愛文芒果千層
description: The Satake Kuro Chopper is a handmade and rough forged knife of exceptional quality. It has been developed with a focus on sharpness, precision
description_long: The Satake Kuro Chopper is a handmade and rough forged knife of exceptional quality. It has been developed with a focus on sharpness, precision and strength, as evidenced by the 5CR15MOV steel of the blade, which has been processed eight times over. The knife even has a hole to hang it up when not in use. The beautiful burnt wood handle provides excellent stability to an already elegant knife. All of the knives in Satake's Kuro series make perfect gifts for cooking enthusiasts who are looking for high quality knives with a little something special.
